programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A handsome oil magnet and overly faithful husband finds his classy and sassy wife in bed with another man in their home. Upon threatening to divorce her, she stages an accident with the help of her best friend, a medical doctor, and fakes amnesia.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Alpha P
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Wild Wild Bayo
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Adeline gets the shock of her life when she is dumped by Kunle without reason. She soon finds out that he has been cheating on her with two other and is getting married to the daughter of a billionaire. She decides to team up with the other women a few days before his wedding to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Mrs Phillip tries to hide her illicit business from her husband, but brings trouble to her doorstep when she unknowingly hires Gina, the niece of her "business associate".

programme.title: Tales of Vanessa
programme.desc: Vanessa constantly manipulates her boyfriend, Deji, who has been thoroughly spoiled by his mother, into giving her money. But soon the money Deji is getting from his mother is not enough for her, so she schemes to get it directly from the sources.

programme.title: Enemy Closer
programme.desc: The relationship between Muna and Owen falls apart when Muna discovers that Owen is having an affair. The betrayal cuts her so deep, she decides to take drastic action leading to fatal consequences.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Alpha P
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couple's daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: The Three Brides
programme.desc: Kayode loves women as much as he loves to lie about how much money he has. Now, he has become the most eligible bachelor in town and women want to keep him by all means. Unaware of kayode’s true pocket status, the women fight over maintaining their position in kayode’s life. Empowered by their charms, the women get kayode to fall in love with all three of them at the same time. But is kayode the man these women truly want to be with?

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. On the third anniversary of her husband’s death, a widow receives a strange visitor who reveals some hidden secrets surrounding her late husband and demands something from her which her husband owed – something she is willing to lay down her life for.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Ìrètí
programme.desc: When a young lady full of life and vigor is diagnosed with cancer, she is forced to hold on to hope for survival, by channeling her passion and skill for costume design.

programme.title: Salamatu's Rhapsody
programme.desc: Salamatu, a young woman torn between her love for hip-hop and her family’s strong traditional values and expectations, must win her father over to support her love for hip hop.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge Season 6 - Kemuel
programme.desc: AMC Music Lounge returns for its sixth season bringing you some new interviews, new live performances, fun musical games, and many more from legendary and emerging artistes. New interviews with emerging and established artistes.

programme.title: Love Box
programme.desc: Two long-term unmarried lovers relocate to Lagos for greener pastures and experience relationship with other people before settling down. Their affair relationship becomes threatened as they begin to make new friends and discover new lifestyles.

programme.title: Silhouette
programme.desc: A woman dissatisfied in her marriage complicates things further when she begins an affair with her cook despite being warned against it by everyone around her.

programme.title: Flip Up
programme.desc: A woman’s social media habits has her believing she is a celebrity and causes friction between her husband and friends. She soon faces a betrayal that makes her reconsider her ways but is it too late to change?

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Muna tries to help her friend, Hauwa, who has just been dumped by her boyfriend. Muna begins a YouTube series to help her friend get out of that post relationship depression by encouraging her to despise men, but she falls in love with their very annoying neighbour instead. Tired of hiding her new relationship, she is stuck with the options of either risking her friendship and career or risking a chance at love.
